zh.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-2: 通知模板结合通知配置为告警消息通知提供支撑。通知模板只能调用同一类型的通知配置服务。
zh.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-5: 使用固定的通知配置发送此通知模板
zh.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-7: 以标签的维度通知该标签下所有用户
zh.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-9: 微信公众号中配置的消息模板
zh.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-11: 点击消息之后进行页面跳转
zh.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-13: 点击消息之后打开对应的小程序
zh.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-15: 点击消息之后跳转到小程序的具体页面
zh.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-17: 支持填写带变量的动态模板。变量填写规范示例：{0}。填写动态参数后，可对变量的名称、类型、格式进行配置，以便告警通知时填写。

en.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-2: The notification template combined with notification configuration provides support for alarm message notifications. Notification templates can only call notification configuration services of the same type.
en.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-5: Send this notification template using a fixed notification configuration
en.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-7: Notify all users under the tag based on its dimensions
en.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-9: Message template configured in WeChat official account
en.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-11: Click on the message to jump to the page
en.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-13: After clicking on the message, open the corresponding mini program
en.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-14: 6. Jump to the specific path of the mini program
en.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-15: After clicking on the message, you will be redirected to the specific page of the mini program
en.doc.WeixinApp.2146920-17: Support filling in dynamic templates with variables. Example of variable filling standard: {0}. After filling in the dynamic parameters, the name, type, and format of the variables can be configured for filling in during alarm notifications.
